description: The blade is slightly dulled by age, but still useful for slaying monsters. When held, the wisdom of its previous owners flows through you.
A hefty spear, clearly well-loved once upon a time. Near the base of the handle lies a small engraving of two initials, 'N.L.'
Carved from sturdy wood, this bow gleams with polish, its bowstring taut with anticipation for the next arrow to be shot.
